name: Ryan Burke
text: I didn't know this place existed, but I was definitely excited to see it. As a fan of hot sauce I was intrigued to see what was inside. Lo and behold it was a store literally filled with hot sauce, seasoning, and salsa. That lady that was working (I wish I got her name) was very helpful and knowledgeable. From the moment we walked in we were greeted kindly. All of my questions were answered and I couldn't help but purchase some hot sauce after receiving fabulous samples. The garlic and pepper hot sauce was delicious. If you like hot sauce, check this place out!

name: Johnny Tims
text: They have the most variety in hot sauces, salsas, seasonings, and wing sauces I have seen. They offer free samples of almost all of it. Worth a visit at least once. Staff was very helpful and knowledgeable.

name: David McElroy
text:
My daughter and I both had a wonderful first visit yesterday.
What an overwhelming selection!
The young lady who helped us, Tracy, was absolutely charming and was very accommodating in helping us decide what to purchase. She was also very knowledgeable about the products. It was a fun day and we will be back.

name: Maria Hayes
text:
If you like hot sauces but want to "try before you buy" this is the place for you. If you can imagine it in a hot sauce, wing sauce, jelly, seasonings they most likely have it.
The manager is very passionate about their products and will spend all the time you need with you helping you to find the perfect product for you.

name: Russell Collins
text: Very friendly staff. Wonderful selection of pepper sauce from the mild to hot the way I like it

name: Cathy Crane
text: We had a great time there today. The hubby took the"The End" challenge and survived lol. The manager is amazing. She shared some good stories and let us try anything in the store. You need to go by there.

name: Ian Hutchins
text: Great experience! The lady that worked there was very nice and extremely helpful. The spices are all so good and its awesome you can taste before you buy. But i had some mango.

name: James Lee
text: Very helpful employees, great variety of hot sauces

name: Jennifer Weathers
text: I was able to create my own tea with the flavors they have, including the sugar. I used Coconut flavored loose tea and Butterscotch Cremè Sugar to create this delicious iced tea blend! Very yummy and so much fun to be able to try the tea before buying to take home. I wish I had one closer to where I live!

name: Andy Geiger
text: First timers who went in pleasantly surprised. Flavored teas were amazing and the black tea was stout,flavourful, and smooth with a lump or 2 of sugar. Amazing staff. My wife and I shortly revisited.

name: Pieter Slinkman
text: Very good store, needed cardamom seeds and they even asked how many ounces I needed!

name: Laura Ledbetter Perez
text: Great store with very helpful employees, we love everything we got from them. Especially the drink mixes!

name: Dawn Mattox
text: Lovely shop. Great selection.

name: Laurie Rials
text: Great selection. Store is inviting with friendly & helpful staff.

name: Jeff J
text: An awesome place to buy spices, teas, and salts. Super friendly and helpful. The spices are fresh and priced accordingly. I had been ordering spices from Morton & Bassett. Glad I found a local supplier quality products staffed by the owner and two others. A pleasant experience as a new resident of Fairhope.

name: Dale Zimmer
text: Awesome place! Lovely people that run it.

name: Rich Nagel
text: Lots of options , very friendly staff

name: Robert C
text: An absolute gem of a store that offers try-before-you-buy gourmet Olive oils and Balsamic vinaigrette. Olive oils this fresh are hard to find and the infused options are an awesome way to mix it up. There is also a huge variety of balsamic vinaigrette with quality you'll never find at a local grocery store. I was also pleased to find bread dipping spices to add to the oil. Prices are very reasonable and the staff make you feel like family!

resp.text: Thanks Robert! So glad you came by, we love coming up with & sharing recipe ideas & flavor combinations. Glad you like our bread dipping spice blend, it's one of our favorites!

name: Debbie Dunaway
text: This is an incredible place for balsamic vinegars and infused olive oils. The owner is very knowledgeable and helpful. Great for gifts.

name: Gerard
text:
I have thanked the owner twice for opening a store like this in Montgomery. It is a wonderful treasure if one enjoys food or cooking. I love to cook and I feel I know something about olive oil and balsamic vinegar but she knows far more than I will ever know. It is an extremely wonderful treat for Montgomery. Now we do not have to commute to Atlanta, New Orleans or New York City for extremely high quality olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
Thank you to both owners!!!

resp.text: Wow, thank you so much Gerard! So very glad you’ve enjoyed using our products, cheers to great food!

name: Philip Lerner
text: Excellent place

name: Larry Summons
text: I absolutely love to cook, I was pleasantly surprised to find this location. A wide variety of olive oils and balsamic vinegars, and my personal favorite the Foco charcoal! Our last visit was amazing, sampling different balsamic flavors and exploring the possibilities for future dishes.

resp.text: Thank you so much Larry! We love when you sample so you can experiment & know you'll love what you get, there are so many ideas!

name: Marion Ackley
text: When I hand you my money hand me back my money don't ever put my money on the counter. Happy Thanksgiving

resp.text: We apologize Marion. At the time it appeared you were looking for something in your purse so I placed it on the counter for you to get at your convenience while I finished packaging your order for you. Sorry if I misread the situation and that you felt offended, that would NEVER be our intention.

name: Anita Rabidou
text: This place is amazing! If you are looking to add flavor to your life check out the wide array of vinegar and oils they have to offer.

resp.text: Thank you so much Anita! Always good to see you, glad you're enjoying everything, thanks again!

name: Janet May
text: I just love this shop. Friendly staff and great products!!

name: Anthony Cornelius
text: Cool employees.Smells great inside.Makes me want to go home and cook.You can get their products at the pig. I usually pick up a bag of meat rub for ribs or pork roast. Damit now I'm hungry.

name: Scott McKenzie
text: Fairly straightforward place to deliver to. No after hours unloading but the dock manager/operator is very nice. I almost gave 4 stars because of the dock setup lot and the staging area. Very little room and employee cars on both sides of you quilt you have to basically alley dock because of the short run up. After a couple deliveries you figure it out.

name: Shelby Blair
text: Loved working there. Most of the people were great. All the bosses r one of a kind. Don't think I will ever find another job that ment that much to me

name: Beck D
text: No overnight parking, decent unloading time, facilities upon request

name: Jon Strunk
text: Super nice staff at the Receiving area. We shot the breeze about NCAA basketball and football. An hour to unload, tops. I hope I get the same level of awesomeness again. Definitely worth more than 5 stars.

name: Michael Kesinger
text: An unspoken volume of spices.  Y'all have no idea how important this location is, in the cultivation of your plate!  Awesome standards.

name: Jai Singh
text: No overnight parking. Good guys. Make sure the seal on the trailer match the paperwork.

name: Remy Helu
text: Nice place all you need

name: Jon Johnson
text: Lots of leggs....

name: guiyion mallory
text: There rubs

name: j. rod
text: nice people

name: R K
text:
(Translated by Google) Polite staff, unloaded 2 hours, then apologized for taking so long.

(Original)
Вежливый персонал, разгружали 2 часа, потом извинились что так долго.

name: Kimmy Smith
text: A Little Gem! This is now my GO TO SHOP if I need gifts for my friends, family, or even myself! Local Art work, Crystals, and Soaps HANDMADE by Real Human Beings. The best selection of Indian turquoise in this area! When I shop at Cadeaux Caches I know I’m not supporting a big corporation but a small business that really cares! Donna is such a joy and so knowledgeable from her travels all over the world.Highly recommend!

name: P
text: Mrs. Donna is always so welcoming and knowledgeable about the items. Such beautiful energy. One of my favorite shops in the gulf area!!!

name: Jennifer Groves
text: Excellent store go there often. Reasonable prices. Employees very helpful. Owner is super nice.

name: Natalie Dodd
text: I absolutely love this store! It is not only really neat, but everyone here is so kind. There are such unique and fantastic things here. It’s the best store! Not only is it the only fair trade store, when shopping here you are not only supporting local businesses, but various charities around the world!!!

name: Sierota Beth Brackett
text: Healing crystals, unique gifts from around the world, items which support charitable efforts... everything is hand selected by owner during her travels. Friendly staff, clean store, welcoming environment. Perfect place to find a gift as unique as the person receiving it!

name: Katelin Wilkins
text: The space is very well organized but also inviting. A bit more interaction with the guests would be nice, but the staff was quite friendly at checkout. I love the pre bagged crystal set for protection I found for my boyfriend. Very informative  for him.

name: Paula Birindelli
text: Love this store! Has fair trade items as well as local artisan items. Very unique.

name: Terry Kasmia
text: What a great store.  So many interesting and unique items that I haven't seen anywhere else.  Great, friendly, knowledgeable staff.  Gifts for absolutely everyone and any occasion.  I highly recommend this store!

name: Allen Gillespie
text: Great and friendly place. Lots of cool things from Native Americans to Other countries.

name: Lisa Davison
text: Nice little place.

name: Jessica Barber
text: Lots of cool stuff!! Helpful staff 😎

name: Zac May
text: Wonderful shop, found so many amazing things! Never disappoint!

name: shannon moore
text: Great Place with lots of cool items. I love the rock and crystals they carry and very knowledgeable.

name: Jessica Savage
text: Fun place to shop with a wonderful assortment of rocks and minerals!

name: Emory Hickey
text: It's my favorite store to go to! The staff is very kind, and helpful!

name: Michael Pitts
text: Full of wonderful little abstract things

name: Haylie Rae
text: Terrible

resp.text: Haylie, we learn a lot from our reviews and would love to get some feedback to why you rated us so low, we normally get 5 stars.  Please let us know what we can do to improve..  we always try to give everyone a great experience in the store.
